body: Man, this is why I'm fucking afraid of having another relationship. Sad. Bitches and niggas ain't loyal smh
Man, I'm not into cheating but the art was fucking excellent! One small issue: did the mf put his thing and mixed all of his fluids, hers and the husband's jizz? Tf man.

Ok it's over we've found the best hentai. It doesn't get better from here. x2
ps: is cheating not NTR, don't confuse categories!!!
yup, think about it, how that man isnt the babys father

No NTR, just cheating. Lately I see too much stories tagged as NTR when they aren't and that make me feel that those that do it, upload the story an tag it 'NTR', do it with the goal of provoke the readers like us and make us argue about it... just a feeling :/
this is an NTR? didnt know a tag as low as NTR can get this kind of art
Fact: If you remove the chapters with the husband, this is just a wholesome vanilla seggs.

I'm intrigued to feel not as much weight as I do after reading an ntr doujin. One could say its because there's no text and all we see are the visuals. Kinda like a silent film. Although, this could easily be just a doujin about two people fucking if one disregards the pages with the other guy. Uhm, but still, about the feeling of having a lighter 'weight'. Probably not as bad as most ntr, from my perspective. Art is good too, really well made. I really hope I'm making a bit of sense into this feeling of mine after reading this. Not exactly much of an ntr person, but if its good art, its good art. Thats all there is to that
The most high quality art I've ever seen in an NTR dam
One of my first doujin, still great.

This is good civilization.
That bathtub scene was incredible, it had a such a vivid sound with just images, and the atmosphere was on point. It gave me the chills. 
I can't wait to see more works from this author.

Now this is surprisingly good and underrated for its simplicity (no need for dialogues) and great art. It's different but it gets the vibe across, a different kind of masterpiece.

Shit I'm in the same boat Giovanna. I'm all against NTR, but this is one of those rare exceptions because its so comfy and mellow opposed to the usual NTR that exaggerates stuff and has obscene over the top angles and movements.
